001/**  This controller provides functionality for the purchase page and commits all order and customer information to the database
002 * @author Shruti Oruganti
003 */
004package src.controller;
005
006import src.database.db_connect;
007
008import static src.controller.useful_functions.switch_scene;
009
010import java.sql.*;
011
012import javafx.fxml.FXML;
013import javafx.scene.control.Button;
014import javafx.scene.control.Label;
015import javafx.event.ActionEvent;
016
017import java.text.NumberFormat;
018import java.util.Locale;
019
020import src.model.customer;
021import src.model.order;
022import src.model.order_item;
023
024/**
025 * This class provides functionality for the purchase page and commits all order and customer information to the database
026 */
027public class transaction_page_controller {
028
029    @FXML private Label total_price;        // label that shows the running total
030    @FXML private Button purchase_button;   // the big “Purchase” button
031
032    private boolean purchaseDone = false;
033    private final NumberFormat currency = NumberFormat.getCurrencyInstance(Locale.US);
034
035    private customer customer;
036    private order order;
037    
038    /**
039     * Receiveing and storing order and cutsomer information from customer page controller and updating total label with the order's subtotal
040     * @param customer - the name of the customer
041     * @param order - the order of the customer
042     */
043    public void setData(customer customer, order order) {
044        this.customer = customer;
045        this.order = order;
046        updateTotalLabel();
047    }
048
049    /**
050     * Initialising the FXML page elements
051     */
052    @FXML
053    public void initialize() {
054        purchaseDone = false;
055        if (purchase_button != null) purchase_button.setText("Purchase");
056        updateTotalLabel();
057    }
058
059    /**
060     * This function commits all order and customer details to database
061     */
062    private void commitToDatabase() {
063
064        try (Connection conn = db_connect.getConnection()) {
065            conn.setAutoCommit(false);
066
067            //Insert Customer
068            int customerId = -1;
069            PreparedStatement checkStmt = conn.prepareStatement("SELECT customerid FROM customer WHERE cus_fname = ? AND cus_lname = ?");
070            checkStmt.setString(1, customer.getFirstName());
071            checkStmt.setString(2, customer.getLastName());
072
073            ResultSet rs = checkStmt.executeQuery();
074            if (rs.next()) {
075                customerId = rs.getInt("customerid");
076                customer.setCustomerId(customerId);
077                System.out.println("Existing customer found: " + customerId);
078            }
079
080            if (customerId == -1) {
081                PreparedStatement insertStmt = conn.prepareStatement("INSERT INTO customer (cus_fname, cus_lname) VALUES (?, ?) RETURNING customerid");
082                insertStmt.setString(1, customer.getFirstName());
083                insertStmt.setString(2, customer.getLastName());
084
085                ResultSet rs1 = insertStmt.executeQuery();
086                if (rs1.next()) {
087                    customerId = rs1.getInt("customerid");
088                    customer.setCustomerId(customerId);
089                    System.out.println("New customer inserted: " + customerId);
090                }
091            }
092
093            //Insert Order
094            int orderId;
095            double subtotal = order.getSubtotal();
096            double tax = subtotal * 0.0825;
097            double total = subtotal + tax;
098
099            PreparedStatement stmt = conn.prepareStatement("INSERT INTO orders (customerid, orderdate, ordertime, ordersubtotal, ordertax, ordertotal) VALUES (?, CURRENT_DATE, NOW(), ?, ?, ?) RETURNING orderid");
100            stmt.setInt(1, customer.getCustomerId());
101            stmt.setDouble(2, subtotal);
102            stmt.setDouble(3, tax);
103            stmt.setDouble(4, total);
104
105            ResultSet rs2 = stmt.executeQuery();
106            if (rs2.next()) {
107                orderId = rs2.getInt("orderid");
108                order.setId(orderId);
109            } else {
110                throw new SQLException("Failed to insert order");
111            }
112
113            //Insert Order Items
114            for (order_item item : order.getItems()) {
115                PreparedStatement stmt1 = conn.prepareStatement("INSERT INTO orderitems (orderid, customerid, productid, sugarlevel, icelevel) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?) RETURNING orderitemid");
116                stmt1.setInt(1, order.getId());
117                stmt1.setInt(2, customer.getCustomerId());
118                stmt1.setInt(3, item.getProduct().getId());
119                stmt1.setInt(4, item.getSugarLevel());
120                stmt1.setInt(5, item.getIceLevel());
121
122                ResultSet rs3 = stmt1.executeQuery();
123                if (rs3.next() == false) {
124                    throw new SQLException("Failed to insert order");
125                }
126
127                //Updated inventory item quanitities
128                PreparedStatement stmt2 = conn.prepareStatement("SELECT ingredientid, quantity FROM drinkingredients WHERE productid = ?");
129                stmt2.setInt(1, item.getProduct().getId());
130                ResultSet rsIngredients = stmt2.executeQuery();
131
132                while (rsIngredients.next()) {
133                    int ingredientId = rsIngredients.getInt("ingredientid");
134                    double quantity = rsIngredients.getDouble("quantity");
135
136                    PreparedStatement updateStmt = conn.prepareStatement("UPDATE ingredients SET currentquantity = currentquantity - ? WHERE ingredientid = ?");
137                    updateStmt.setDouble(1, quantity);
138                    updateStmt.setInt(2, ingredientId);
139                    updateStmt.executeUpdate();
140                }
141            }
142
143            conn.commit();
144            System.out.println("Order committed successfully!");
145
146        } catch (SQLException e) {
147            e.printStackTrace();
148        }        if (purchase_button != null) purchase_button.setText("Purchase");
149        //Database connection automatically closes due to try-catch block
150        updateTotalLabel();
151    }
152
153    /**
154     * This function sets the label to reflect order subtotal when order is recieved from customer FXML page
155     */
156    private void updateTotalLabel() {
157        if (order == null) {
158            total_price.setText(currency.format(0));
159            return;
160        }
161        double total = order.getSubtotal() * 1.0825;
162        if (total_price != null) {
163            total_price.setText(currency.format(total));
164        }
165    }
166
167    /**
168     * This function calls the function to commit to database and display text to say purchase was successful when purchase button is clicked
169     * @param event - Trigger that calls the function
170     */
171    @FXML
172    private void handle_purchase(ActionEvent event) {
173        commitToDatabase();
174
175        // Update UI
176        updateTotalLabel();
177        purchase_button.setText("Purchase successful!");
178        purchaseDone = true;
179    }
180
181    /**
182     * This function handles the back click action
183     * @param event - Trigger for the function to be called
184     */
185    @FXML
186    private void handle_back_click(ActionEvent event) {
187        // Before purchase -> go back to enter_name
188        // After purchase  -> go to order_page
189        if (purchaseDone) {
190            switch_scene("GUI/order_page.fxml", event);
191        } else {
192            switch_scene("GUI/enter_name.fxml", event);
193        }
194    }
195
196    
197}
